name: Mirror Cube
description:
Mirror Cube

Mirror Cube is going to be in development

from June 3rd 2022 to August 7th 2022, from August 22nd 2022 to September 30th 2022, and from November 23rd 2022 to December 10th 2022.

Release Dates

Windows 7-11: January 7th 2023 Android: December 19th 2022 Unity Play: January 3rd 2023 Itch Io: December 24th 2022 GitHub(Windows 7-11 and Android): January 8th 2023

How to Play | Players

In this game there are two cubes: Player Cube , and Mirror Cube.

How to Play | Movement

If you click right the Player Cube would move right BUT, the Mirror Cube would move left. If you click left the Player Cube would move left BUT, the Mirror Cube would move right. If you click forwards the Player Cube would move forwards BUT, the Mirror Cube would move backwards. If you click backwards the Player Cube would move backwards BUT, the Mirror Cube would move forwards.

How to Play | Your Goal

Your goal is to collide the two cubes.
